replies.body: when is it coming out, i love the new zed skin!!!

I was wondering, in Zyra's new short story she spawns from a zychid - is this how she originally comes to be, or has she sprouted in the past? The zychid was grafted to a piece of bone when Hatilly buys it which makes me feel like Zyra has sprouted before but can perhaps revert back to a flower-like state? It'd be interesting to know if that's actually the case or if I'm just reading into it too deeply XD

Hi i have been playing league of legends for about 6 years now.i love it.but please can you bring a snow day back to oce server or all round.i love the snow skins and want to buy the skins but you cant buy them only certain ones like snow bard and such.please thank you.keep up the awsome stuff :)
They come back for Christmas time each year :) Some (like Snow Day Bard) remain available because the champion lacks other skins.
Will we get more info on the ruined king himself and the argent mountains in the future ? also does Hecarim and Kalista fly through the mist during the harrowing or do they teleport around
